content.en: Multi-sensor fusion: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the performance and reliability of multi-sensor systems in different applications. These algorithms, such as weighted fusion algorithms, fuzzy sensor fusion algorithms, and data fusion algorithms based on adaptive weight, play a crucial role in achieving accurate and stable sensor data in wireless sensor networks. Additionally, improved algorithms based on evidence theory, intuitionistic fuzzy set, and fuzzy mathematics have been developed to enhance the fusion of conflicting information and heterogeneous data. These advancements in algorithmic techniques are helping to improve the accuracy and efficiency of multi-sensor data fusion in various fields, including early landslide warning systems.
content.da: Multi-sensor fusion: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen og pålideligheden af multi-sensorsystemer i forskellige applikationer. Disse algoritmer, såsom vægtede fusionsalgoritmer, fuzzy sensor fusionsalgoritmer og datafusionsalgoritmer baseret på adaptiv vægt, spiller en afgørende rolle i at opnå nøjagtige og stabile sensordata i trådløse sensornetværk. Desuden er forbedrede algoritmer baseret på evidensteori, intuitionistisk fuzzy sæt og fuzzy matematik blevet udviklet for at forbedre fusionen af modstridende information og heterogene data. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk teknikker hjælper med at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af multi-sensor datafusion i forskellige felter, herunder tidlige skredvarslingssystemer.
